mapper.select: SELECT id, content, writer, title, view_cnt as viewCnt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%M-%d') as regDate SELECT review_id, video_id, writer_id, writer_name, review_title, review_content, date_format(write_date, '%Y-%M-%d') as write_date FROM review WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (video_id, writer_id, writer_name, review_title, review_content) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent})
